zspeed.label: Z-axis tip speed
zspeed.tip: Z-axis (out-of-plane) movement speed for AFM tip in angstroms per second.

hspeed.label: Horizonal tip speed
hspeed.tip: Horizontal (in-plane) movement speed for AFM tip in angstroms per second.

vspeed.label: Vertical tip speed
vspeed.tip: Vertical (in-plane) movement speed for AFM tip in angstroms per second.

v_displacement.label: Vertical displacement between scans
v_displacement.tip: Vertical (in-plane) displacement of the tip after each horizontal scan.
